desc.en:
The Xi'an Metro is an urban rail transit system in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, China. It was established in September 2006 and is a part of the city's urban rail transit system. Its first line (Xi'an Metro Line 2) was put into trial operation in September 2011, making Xi'an the first city in northwest China to operate a subway, and also the 14th city in Chinese Mainland to operate a subway. Its operation network has been extended to the adjacent Xianyang City. By December 2024, there are 11 lines of Xi'an Metro that have been put into operation, including Line 1, Line 2, Line 3, Line 4, Line 5, Line 6, Line 8, Line 9, Line 10, Line 14, and Line 16, all of which use the subway system, with a total operating mileage of 403 kilometers; Also operate the Xihu Line of the urban railway, using railway standards; There are a total of 235 stations (excluding double counting of transfer stations), including 34 transfer stations. On December 31, 2024, the passenger flow of the Xi'an subway network reached a new historical high, safely transporting 5.539 million citizen passengers. The daily passenger volume of the Xi'an subway exceeded the "5 million mark" for the first time
Due to Xi'an being the ancient capital of thirteen dynasties in China, with abundant underground ancient relics, subway construction is often carried out simultaneously with archaeological excavations. The Xi'an Metro has a rigorous set of process standards for planning, exploration, excavation, and protection, ensuring the safety of cultural relics and the timely opening of the line.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xi%27an_Metro
desc.zh-Hans:
西安地铁，是中国陕西省西安市的城市轨道交通系统，始建于2006年9月，为西安市城市轨道交通系统的一部分。其第一条线路（西安地铁2号线）于2011年9月开通试运营，使西安市成为中国西北地区首座营运地铁的城市，同时也是中国大陆第14个营运地铁的城市，其运营网已经延伸至了相邻的咸阳市，截至2024年12月，西安地铁开通运营的线路共有11条，分别为：1号线、2号线、3号线、4号线、5号线、6号线、8号（环）线、9号线、10号线、14号线、16号线，均采用地铁系统，运营里程共计403千米；另运营市域铁路西户线，采用铁路制式；共设车站235座（换乘站不重复计算），其中换乘站34座，2024年12月31日，西安地铁线网客流再创历史新高，平安运送市民乘客553.9万人次，西安地铁单日客运量首次突破“500万大关”
由于西安是中国十三朝古都，地下古代遗存丰富，地铁建设也常与考古发掘工作同步进行。西安地铁对于规划、勘探、发掘、保护的系列环节有一套严谨的流程规范，保证了文物安全与线路如期开通。https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/西安地铁
